title: Product Hunt Products Scraper
description: Fast Product Hunt product data collection by category. Extract rich metrics, categories, tags, and launch details with automatic pagination.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Custom Product Hunt URL to start scraping from (optional). If provided, this overrides the category setting.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Products
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of products to scrape (1+). Actor continues until this target is met or no more products are found.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages (Optional Safety Cap)
max_pages.description: Optional safety cap. Set to 0 for automatic pagination until results_wanted is reached or products end.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Optional proxy settings for enhanced reliability
